relation: San Juan College is very affordable for those who do not want to pay University Tuition.
The town offers plenty to do and it is close to the Colorado boarder. So we get to enjoy their perks too!
There are no dorms as of yet. San Juan College is a community college.
Get started! There no such thing as being to old to start a new path!

San Juan College is an awesome college to attend. They make it easy to get an academic schedule together to achieve your goals. There are plenty of people that work here to give the students the personal attention they need to achieve these goals.
pageTitle: San Juan College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 05/16/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 1 of 39 Richard from Aztec, NM Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Academic Rigor I don't care what anyone else says, the classes here are just as challenging as any state college. They can be frustrating at times, but not too much to keep you lost throughout the course material. I also haven't had one professor yet that I didn't understand or had a problem comprehending when listening to them in my classes. Tips for prospective students If you're ever lost just go to the nearest help desk (which can be located in every building) and they can direct you to the classroom that you're having a hard time finding. The professors are extremely helpful and friendly so don't be afraid to ask for help whenever you need it. I don't know how many times I've been saved thanks to my professors. In three sentences For a community college it is a very inviting and friendly place to go for fresh out of high school students. The professors are all very friendly and work well with the students in helping them succeed in their classes. The campus isn't too large or too small to be crammed or to get lost in and the classes are just diverse enough to get any students attention in what the college has to offer. Login to rate or flag
